jobs.title: Research Engineer – Data Science
task: Developed advanced data mining techniques for analyzing text, stickers, images, and videos on Telegram, improving data extraction and analysis efficiency.
Engineered large language models (Llama) to predict user roles and information dissemination patterns, enhancing the understanding of user behavior.
Collaborated with multi-disciplinary research teams to deliver successful project outcomes while independently managing key tasks.

jobs.title: Software Engineer – Full Stack
task: Led the development of StoreEasy Management Console (SEMC), improving software quality by 15% across 4 support program releases and reducing post-release bug reports by 34%.
Engineered ETL pipelines and reusable UI components in React/Node.js, enhancing system robustness and user experience within cross-functional teams.
Implemented Agile methodologies and CI/CD practices using GitHub and Jenkins, which resulted in a 40% reduction in time-to-market and increased international user engagement.

jobs.title: Research Assistant Intern
task: Collaborated with PhDs and Research Assistants on Project Eye gaze, conducting experiments and user studies to analyze large eye gaze datasets and utilizing user gaze to mark boundaries in images.
Conducted comparative analysis of ML models (SVM, Decision Trees) and neural network architectures (CNN, LSTM, Transformer) for EyeGaze improvement, achieving ~99% accuracy.

jobs.title: Software Engineer Intern – Full Stack
task: Designed and developed UX screens for SEMC using Invision, implemented on React JS for client-side development.
Achieved 100% backlog defect clearance as a full stack developer refactoring existing legacy codebase.
Leveraged Pytest for unit testing for quality assurance and Grafana/Kibana for system monitoring in 2 Feature Releases.

jobs.title: Software Developer Intern
task: Developed an interactive blogging platform using Atom, achieving a 40% faster deployment rate, demonstrating efficiency.

Implemented user authentication functionalities, enhancing user engagement and trust, while seamlessly managing user inputs with Azure SQL Database and A/B testing to enhance functionality for server-side development.

skills.title: Research
skills.skills: Graph neural Networks, Deep Neural Networks, Machine Learning, Dynamic Programming, Pandas & NumPy, Support vector Machines, Data Analysis, Pytorch.
description: Thesis titled Eye-gaze Recognition model achieving a 98% accuracy rate using GCN, surpassing benchmarks like ANN and CNN.
Another thesis focused on detecting facial fraud, yielding a paper accepted by the International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology in 2019.

skills.title: AI/ML
skills.skills: NLP, LLM, Generative AI, Time series prediction, Big data analysis, SQL, Pytorch, Tensorflow.
description: I've tackled diverse projects, predicting crime rates in Chicago using Facebook Prophet.
Analyzed news trends with sentiment lexicon.
Created a Generative AI Self-Introduction App for real-time Q&A based on life narratives.
Engineered models for time series market prediction and LeNet image classification.
Designed an NLP project for spam message classification.

skills.title: Software Development
skills.skills: JavaScript, Node Js, React Js, C#, .Net, Jira, Jenkins, SQL.
description: Experienced in software engineering, with development work on the StoreEasy Management Console at Hewlett Packard Enterprise.
Proficient in end-to-end website development through a web developer internship at Webnish Software Solutions.
Contributed to implementing CI/CD practices, fostering international user engagement, and adding new features in multiple program releases.

skills.title: UI/UX
skills.skills: Figma, Invision, JavaScript, React Js, Jenkins.
description: As a full-stack developer, I bring expertise in UX/UI design, unit testing, and system observability.
Designed UX/UI for the SEMC on Invision and Figma.
Developed on React JS across 2 Support Program Releases.

certifications.title: Ethics in the Age of Generative AI
Generative AI: The Evolution of Thoughtful Online Search
Streamlining Your Work with Microsoft Copilot
Docker & Kubernetes: The Complete Developer's Guide
ACM Summer School on Data Science at Goa University

portfolio.title: Thesis - Eye-Gaze Pattern Recognition
portfolio.description: Developed a high-accuracy eye gaze recognition model with 98% precision using graph neural networks and dynamic programming. Implemented an innovative data processing approach with a dataset of 10 gestures. Achieved 97.67% accuracy, outperforming existing models such as ANN, CNN, GRU, LSTM, and GCN in comparative analyses.

portfolio.title: Thesis - Improved Colour Texture Based Face Spoofing Detection
portfolio.description: Developed a facial fraud detection strategy for authentication systems by analyzing component characteristics and managing large datasets using OpenCV. Applied feature extraction methods (CoALBP, LBP, LPQ, BSIF, SIFT), clustered data with machine learning algorithms, and visualized results in 2D/3D plots on MATLAB. Conducted quantitative image analysis and published findings in the International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology, 2019.

portfolio.title: Time Series Prediction
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive time series prediction model for crime rates in Chicago (2001-2017) using Facebook Prophet

portfolio.title: Big data News analysis
portfolio.description: Designed project analyzing social media trends in news topics, utilizing sentiment lexicon and clustering

portfolio.title: Generative AI self introduction APP
portfolio.description: Implemented a personal interactive language model(LLM) application, enabling users to engage in real-time Q&A sessions with dynamically generated responses based on a life narrative text file.

portfolio2.title: Time series Market prediction
portfolio2.description: Engineered a time series prediction model for commodity market prices, utilizing advanced analytics and Facebook Prophet.

portfolio2.title: Le-Net Image Classification
portfolio2.description: Implemented a LeNet neural network for multi-class classification, achieving accurate predictions across 43 classes in a dataset

portfolio2.title: Natural Language Processing(NLP) Spam filtering
portfolio2.description: Designed a NLP project for effective spam message classification
